Work out daring raids on banks with friends in a desperate multiplayer adventure!
Send news accomplices, seize weapons and mask - it's a fun time of unprecedented plunder! Dallas, Hoxton, Wolf and Chain back in business - it's time to kick to break into a new co-op shooter for up to four players. Ready-trodden path from small shops in the surrounding shakedown prior to the opening of a bank vault?
Features:
* In the robbery, the main thing - good accomplices. When the team bandits different specialties, all goes like clockwork. But do not forget to look around more often, when it comes to the division of the spoils!
* Required help for every self-respecting thief - a network CRIMENET. Only here all the best orders fattest jackpots necessary passwords and turnout. The more done - the more accessible.
* Walk on the matter twice in one place - a bad idea. So, even if you decide to re-execute the order, be prepared to be on a completely new areas, randomly generated game.
* As you move up the career ladder criminal world, you will be able to choose a specialty - the leader of the insurgent, a ghost and a techie. Each features an extensive arsenal of useful skills and appropriate equipment. However, nothing prevents you to compare all and select only the most necessary.
* The louder your glory, the more skills, guns and belongings you should. Do not forget to close the original face mask - now you are able to adjust its appearance by selecting the tens of thousands of possibilities.
* Do not be afraid to get its hands dirty: going on a business, you will catch a gun in mind - from a sniper rifle to a machine pistol from the gun. Connoisseurs will appreciate the variety of upgrade options - scopes, silencers, rifle butts, sighting grid, tree trunks and case. Do not take offense and aesthetes. Here, for example, a gun nut with a handle - is that not a miracle?
* Make life easier with the help of various modifiers. To be successful, all means are good, whether it's fast car, where you will hide the crime scene, the plan of the building, or even a person inside.
* A true star of the world of thieves should have their own style. What course of action is right for you - a quiet neutralization or firing from all barrels? The methods are different, but the goal is the same - to come, take away, to escape.
* If someone is going to steal someone will want to stop it. Controlled artificial intelligence opponents of adequately trained to respond to your actions - as long as you are in fact, be careful and do not relax for a second.
* Many operations are divided into stages. You will have to make important decisions, the consequences of which will affect the plot of the game.
* Successful business itself is pleasant, and only when the triumph provides a decent reward, life takes on new colors. The best recognition of your professionalism will be a great new outfit, you will receive upon successful completion of the raid.
